alert.note: Alert for Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Meagher County Valleys; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 7:42AM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains, Helena Valley, Meagher County Valleys, Snowy and Judith Mountains and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...From Noon today to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Meagher County Valleys; Snowy and Judith Mountains
